title: What is the biggest dichotomy in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Time versus Money. People who want more money are very willing to give up their time. Let me make a million and then I will sit back and enjoy life. What if you run out of time by then? If you can figure out how to balance time and money for optimal “happiness”, you would have addressed one of the big dichotomies of life.
Dichotomy in life? PAIN & PLEASURE PAIN & PLEASURE
